name: Super Miner Battle Farm
description: A community of fighting game players based in South West England and Wales, hosting weekly sessions and monthly tournaments in Bristol.

cost.details: There is small fee for bracket entry to tournaments (Â£2-3), so please bring cash or PayPal to smbfbristol@gmail.com. Otherwise, casual play is free.

booking.details: Review the next event details on the superminerbattle.farm website. Some tournaments can be competitive and have limited places, while walk-ins may be available, advance sign-ups are advised.
